title: SIC! SIC! SIC!
html:
SIC! SIC! SIC!

“ 'Easy writing,' Hemingway once said, 'makes hard reading.' ” —Glen Evans (in The Complete Guide to Writing Non-Fiction, Writer's Digest Books, 1983, p. 25).
